## DurableOperation.getChildOperations() method

Gets all child operations of this operation.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getChildOperations(): DurableOperation[] | undefined;
```

**Returns:**

[DurableOperation](./durable-execution-sdk-js-testing.durableoperation.md)<!-- -->\[\] \| undefined

An array of child operations, or undefined if no operation data is available

## Exceptions

Will throw an error if the operation ID is not available
